All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary Exception Summary 
    Class Description
    AdminController
    Controller class for the admin UI page
    Administrator
    User implementation for administrators
    AdministratorRepository
    Repository for accessing Administrator Users persistence
    ApiError
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    ApiExceptionHandler
    used for error handling at controller level: makes sure that the client receives a meaningful error message when a REST request fails based on https://www.toptal.com/java/spring-boot-rest-api-error-handling
    Experimenter
    User implementation for experimenters
    ExperimenterRepository
    Repository for accessing Experimenter Users persistence
    ExperimentsController
    Controller class for the experiments UI page
    HseApplication
    Main Application class
    HseUserDetailsService
    Provides user details for SpringSecurity authentication
    IndexingController
    Controller class for the indexing UI page
    NoSuchUserException
    Exception thrown on attemts to retrieve a User by a non existing id id user name
    Participant
    User implementation for participants
    ParticipantRepository
    Repository for accessing Participant Users persistence
    Role
    Stores a user's role: one of "ADMIN", "EXPERIMENTER" or "PARTICCIPANT"
    RoleRepository  
    SearchController
    Controller class for the search UI page
    SearchData  
    SearchResult
    Data transfer class for serving search result summaries
    SearchResultList
    Data transfer class containing the query string and the retrieved results
    SearchService
    Service class for interacting with the Lucene Search API
    SecurityConfiguration
    Configuration for user authentication settings
    User
    Base class representing users for security/authentication Planned subclasses: Administrator, Experimenter, Participant
    UserBaseRepository<T extends User>
    Base for User repositories
    UserExistsException
    Exception thrown on attempts to create a User with an already existing user name or id
    UserRepository
    Repository for accessing User persintence via base class
    UserService
    Service class for accessing the User persistence layer
